If you're up for a more unconventional war movie with a touch of humor, "Hitch" might be an enjoyable watch too. This film is about the meeting between legendary director Alfred Hitchcock and François Truffaut, discussing their shared love for cinema. Stars like Will Smith and Dustin Hoffman bring this intriguing tale to life. Enjoy the movies!
